alert.note: Alert for Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 9:49PM EST until February 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mettawee River At Granville. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, water approaches County Route 12. Several feet of water on Upper Turnpike Road and Gray Lane. All low-lying fields underwater. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM EST Thursday the stage was 5.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 9.7 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Mettawee River Granville Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Thu 9 pm: 5.5 Forecast: Fri 1 am 7.4 Fri 7 am 9.7 Fri 1 pm 9.4 Fri 7 pm 7.9 Sat 1 am 7.0 Sat 7 am 6.5 Sat 1 pm 6.1 Sat 7 pm 5.7 Sun 1 am 5.5 Sun 7 am 5.4 &&
